column2: October 9]], [[1968]]) is the game designer of [[Belegost (video game)
column3: Belegost]].<ref name="Tolkien Games">[http://www.lysator.liu.se/tolkien-games/entry/belegost.html Belegost] at Tolkien Games] (retrieved 30 December 2010)</ref><ref>[http://www.worldofspectrum.org/infoseek.cgi Belegost] at [[wikipedia:World of Spectrum
column4: World of Spectrum]] (retrieved 30 December 2010)</ref> He worked together with [[Miroslav Fidler]] on the game.<ref name="Tolkien Games"/>
